label: FinancingRequestResultDocument
comment: A collection of data that reports the result of a financing request.

datatypeProperties.comment: The financed rate, expressed as a percentage, in this financing request result document.

objectProperties.comment: A financed total monetary value in this financing summary document.
The financing status specified in this financing request result document.

referencedBy.comment: The financing request result document specified for this instalment payment.
